title: 成班連登仔怕果幾張圖，其實係咪已經無政府狀態？

replies.msg:
求其搵人打幾隻字，咩一手消息要開拖，就呃哂全部連登仔驚到洗哂版

仲要好多公司都比人早放怕黑社會生事，全部人都投鼠忌器

到底而家呢個仲係咪我認識既全球最安全城市？
到底而家係咪由黑社會話事？
點解連放工返屋企都要驚？仲要係大街大巷、地鐵站、購物商場。

香港係咪已經進入無政府狀態？點解個記者會班官淨係話咩不兩立，完全無行動話比人知安全？

點解都而家都拉唔琴晚係元朗港鐵站打人既暴徒？
200萬人出黎遊行，進入立法會都唔會有人驚，係因為果啲唔係暴徒，係為香港好既人。

但幾百個暴徒周圍打人就令到全港市民人心惶惶，因為果啲係真暴徒，只為私利。但你就唔理，30分鐘都可以無人到地鐵？連警署都可以關門大吉，拎住棍打人就話睇唔到攻擊性武器，仲去搜普通市民。你話唔係合作係咩？

點解香港政府可以無視市民既安全，我地交既稅係做咩？就係比完全唔理市民安全既政府？

Please issue a red travel warning to Hong Kong
Since June , here in Hong Kong.
There are countless evidences show that
Hong Kong’s law and order not being upheld and being invalid.
The government only state that they strongly condemn the insulting action to symbolism of Nation but neglecting the Casualty of citizen caused by the triad and police .
The Hong Kong Police has clearly derelict their duty and attack citizens furiously and inhumanly.
Comparing the situation in June and July, the situation now , is actually more out of control.
Especially in Yuen Long incident
The government allow the police cooperate with the underworld.
Let the triad attack Citizen Indiscriminately in metro and streets.
In fact It is deemed that This is a terrorist attacks under permission of HK gov.
The police stations will close down for few days , they hang up the call ,999 hotline and not going to offer help to any citizen in need,Including foreigners traveling to HK

Therefore, the situation in Hong Kong is extremely unsafe.anyone here maybe attack to death.The basic life safety and human right are not guaranteed.
Therefore, all countries should issue travel warnings to Hong Kong.
